## Database

3 tabulky => 

[\
    Users,\
    Games,\
    GameMoves\
]

### Users =>
* id: Long, (autogenerated)
* username: String
* password: String / hashedString,
* Score: Long,
* Games Won: Long
* Games Lost: Long

### Games =>
* User1: (User) UserIdReference
* User2: (User) UserIdReference
* Winner: (User) UserIdReference
* Moves: List<Move>

#### Move =>
